# Monument for the 150th Anniversary of the Battle of Puebla

The Monument for the 150th Anniversary of the Battle of Puebla is a public park and memorial designed by Enrique Norten of TEN Arquitectos, located in the city of Puebla, Puebla, Mexico. The project was completed during 2011â€“2012, and commemorates the 150th anniversary of the Battle of Puebla.
